mapper.insert: INSERT INTO anidb_member (username, loginid, member_password, email, isFromSocial, isDisabled, member_name, nickname, birthday, gender, member_description) VALUES ( #{username}, #{loginId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{isFromSocial}, #{isDisabled}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{description} )
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, username, loginid AS loginId, member_password as password, email, isFromSocial, isDisabled, member_name as name, nickname, birthday, gender, member_description as description FROM anidb_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE anidb_member SET username = #{username}, loginid = #{loginId}, member_password = #{password}, email = #{email}, isFromSocial = #{isFromSocial}, isDisabled = #{isDisabled}, member_name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, birthday = #{birthday}, gender = #{gender}, member_description = #{description} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
